title: Will Elon Musk Be Able to Keep Twitter’s Advertisers Happy?
description: Mr. Musk once said he hated them, but ad sales are the engine that powers the company he now owns.

title: Elon Musk Starts Putting His Imprint on Twitter
description: The billionaire began as Twitter’s new owner by announcing a content moderation council and meeting employees, as some of the social media service’s users celebrated.

title: Elon Musk Moves to Form Content Moderation Council. Here’s What We Know.
description: The announcement appeared to be a step back from Mr. Musk’s position that Twitter should be an anything-goes platform.

title: Some Far-Right Accounts on Twitter Saw Surge in Followers, Researchers Say
description: It’s unclear if the activity was driven by Elon Musk’s takeover of the company.

title: Requiem for the Arecibo Telescope of Puerto Rico
description: Until its collapse last year, the Arecibo Observatory in Puerto Rico spent six decades tuned to the radio stations of the heavens. There is no plan to rebuild it, and astronomers are in mourning.

title: Securing Your Twitter Account: What to Know
description: After Elon Musk took over, some Twitter users wondered if they should take additional measures to protect their accounts — or even delete them.

title: The Ban on Kanye’s Twitter Account Was Not Lifted
description: The Twitter account for the rapper formerly known as Kanye West was never banned to begin with.

title: Elon Musk Buying Twitter Is a Moment of Celebration for Many
description: The way forward for Twitter is uncertain. But that means Mr. Musk can innovate and change the platform for the better, his supporters say.

title: Trump Says He’s ‘Very Happy’ About Musk’s Twitter Takeover
description: Former President Donald J. Trump said the social media platform was now in “sane hands” with Elon Musk at the helm.

title: Elon Musk Takes Twitter, and Tech Deals, to Another Level
description: Silicon Valley moguls used to buy yachts and islands. Now they are rich enough, and perhaps arrogant enough, to acquire companies they fancy.

title: How Twitter Will Change as a Private Company Under Elon Musk
description: The social media company went public in 2013. But Elon Musk is taking it private as part of his acquisition of the firm. Here’s what that means.

title: Elon Musk Completes $44 Billion Deal to Own Twitter. Finally.
description: The world’s richest man closed his blockbuster purchase of the social media service, thrusting Twitter into a new era.

title: Musk Said to Begin Firing Twitter’s Top Executives
description: Some of Twitter’s top executives were fired on Thursday as Mr. Musk completes his takeover of the social media company.

title: Musk Said to Begin Firing Twitter’s Top Executives
description: Some of Twitter’s top executives were fired on Thursday as Mr. Musk completes his takeover of the social media company.
